timeline.title: 2.Get Sorting Suggestions

timeline.title: 3.Dispose Smartly

accordion.title: What is Intellisort? How does it work?
accordion.desc: Intellisort is an AI-powered platform that analyzes your waste and provides efficient sorting and disposal solutions. Just input the type of waste or take a picture of it, and our AI will generate personalized disposal instructions for you!

accordion.title: Why should I use Intellisort?
accordion.desc: Using Intellisort makes waste management effortless and eco-friendly. It helps you reduce waste, recycle efficiently, and make sustainable choices.

accordion.title: Is Intellisort easy to use?
accordion.desc: Absolutely! Intellisort is designed to be user-friendly. Just enter the type of waste you have or snap a photo, and get instant, easy-to-follow sorting and disposal suggestions.

accordion.title: Is this AI a high school project?
accordion.desc: Yes, Intellisort was developed as part of a high school initiative. We're proud of our student team for creating such a useful tool.

accordion.title: How does Intellisort contribute to the environment?
accordion.desc: By using Intellisort, you ensure that waste is disposed of correctly, reducing landfill use and promoting recycling. This helps conserve resources and lower carbon footprints.

accordion.title: Is Intellisort available in multiple languages?
accordion.desc: No, Intellisort does not support multiple languages, only English.
